name: linter-yalafi
description: This package is linting LaTeX files for spelling and grammar errors

executablePath.description: Command or full path to yalafi. Use %p for current project directory (no trailing /) or %h for current project name.

pythonPath.description: Paths to be added to $PYTHONPATH. Use %p for current project directory or %f for the directory of the current file.

workingDirectory.description: Directory yalafi is run from. Use %p for the current project directory or %f for the directory of the current file.

disableTimeout.title: Disable Execution Timeout
disableTimeout.description: By default processes running longer than 10 seconds will be automatically terminated. Enable this option if you are getting messages about process execution timing out.
